entry.title: Airistech Airis 8 Multi-Use Vaporizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 59.99

The Airis 8 is a two function vape that can be used a wax or dab pen. 

How to use the Airis 8 as a Dab pen:

Simply remove the dab mouthpiece, and heat up the touch coil. To heat the coil up you just need to hold down the power button. Once the coil has properly heated you can touch it to the concentrate you are using to dab. It is important that you inhale on the dab vape pen mouthpiece as you touch the coil to the concentrate. Make sure that you do not touch the hot coil with your fingers before or after dabbing.

How to use the Airis 8 as a was pen:

To use the Airis 8 as a portable wax pen you need to use the enclosed wax coil, not the exposed dab coil. Once the correct coil has been screwed into the body of the vape you need to load the coil with concentrate. To do this just unscrew the top cap part of the coil and load wax. Make sure to not overload the coil. Replace the mouthpiece and then turn it on. You must hold the power button down to vaporize the wax.

Packaging:

  • The battery or body portion of the vaporizer.
  • Two coils, one for dabbing and one for vaping.
  • A removable mouthpiece.
  • A micro-USB charging cable.
  • A metal dab tool.
  • A cleaning brush.
  • The user manual

entry.title: Uwell Caliburn G Pod Kit (BC Compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 39.99

The authentic Uwell Caliburn G Pod Kit in CRC Version is the upgrade version of Caliburn, works with 690mAh built-in battery, and can fire up to max 15W output. Caliburn G Kit with a pocket-friendly single button layout design provides a simple interface, plus an easy-to-use open pod system, making it a perfect start for beginner vapers.

The Caliburn G has a lightweight frame and slim design, very easy to carry. Uwell Caliburn G Pod kit can vape directly through the air pressure sensor or manual button to start vaping. Uwell Caliburn G Pod comes with 2.0ml capacity with top-fill and leakproof design. 

The pod supports two different airflows: restricted DTL vaping (when the air inlet of the pod and the air inlet of the device are close to each other) and MTL vaping (when the air inlet of the pod and the air inlet of the device are far away from each other).

Features:

  • Built-in 690mAh Battery with Max 15W Output
  • 1.5A USB Type-C Charging
  • Quickly Lock / Unlock By 5 Clicks
  • Dual Firing Mechanism – Draw Activated or Button Activated
  • 2mL Refillable Pod with Top Filling Design
  • 2 different airflows, ingenious airway design: restricted DTL and MTL vape

Includes:

  • 1x Uwell Caliburn G Pod System Kit
  • 1x Uwell Caliburn Pod [CRC]
  • 1x USB Type-C Cable
  • 1x User Manual

The SMOK IPX 80 Kit with CRC in BC version combines high quality and excellent performance. It integrates innovative airflow adjustment design and IPX67 protection level manufacturing processes into one device.

This SMOK IPX 80 Pod Mod kit is certified by IPX67, waterproof & dustproof & shockproof, making it truly one of the most durable kits on the market. It's ideal for those who travel with their vaping systems regularly, as it can withstand many unfavorable conditions.

With the integrated large 3000mAh battery, the IPX 80 Kit has sufficient power reserve and can provide a long-lasting vapor experience in the power range of 1-80W in VW mode. The charging current of up to 1.4A can quickly replenish the battery power through the Type-C port. With a complete control panel, the hand-held operation is intuitive and convenient. A range of in-built safety features including overcharge and short circuit protection provides reliability for a long-lasting device.

entry.title: Vaporesso Gen Nano Kit (BC Compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 79.99

Vaporesso GEN Nano Kit consists of the GEN Nano Mod and the GTX Tank 22 and it is a mini and portable version of Vaporesso GEN Kit. Vaporesso GEN Nano Box mod is equipped with a built-in battery with a capacity of 2000mAh and supports 2A fast charging, offering you a longer vaping experience in a portable size. The maximum output power of GEN Nano is limited to 80 watts. Equipped with the advanced AXON chipset at the helm, the GEN Nano releases the full potential of the GEN NANO, The innovative Pulse Mode supported by the AXON chip is a way how it brings out the power, making GEN NANO fires every 0.02s to maintain the temperature control settings previously input, providing you a delicate controlled vaping experience. The Power ECO MODE leads to a longer battery endurance. 

Vaporesso GEN Nano Kit comes with GTX Tank 22 atomizer, which comes with a 2ml straight glass tube. The tank is compatible with GTX series coils, you can enjoy the optimal flavor and dense vapor released. With plenty of coil options and resistances, the GTX Tank 22 is extremely versatile, while delivering optimal airflow control and a convenient top-fill system.

Parameters

  • Dimensions: 115.0mm(height) x 40.3mm(width) x 24.2mm(thickness)
  • Battery Capacity: Built-in 2000mAh
  • Output Power: 5-80W
  • Modes: VW Mode, Pulse Mode, Power ECO Mode, Smart TC Mode, DIY Mode
  • Tank Capacity: 2ml
  • Coils: GTX 0.2Ω Mesh Coil; GTX 0.6Ω Mesh Coil
  • Compatible with other GTX Coils
  • Charging Current: DC 5V/2A, Micro USB
  • Display: 0.91" OLED Screen

It comes with

  • 1 x GEN NANO MOD
  • 1 x GTX TANK 22 (2ml)
  • 1 x GTX 0.2Ω Mesh Coil
  • 1 x GTX 0.6Ω Mesh Coil
  • 1 x Glass Tube (2ml)

entry.title: Uwell Aeglos Pod Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 49.99

Check out the Uwell Aeglos Pod Kit, with a built-in 1500mAh battery and a max output up to 60W. The output wattage is adjustable from 5W to 60W by pressing the "-" and "+" buttons & with USB Type-C fast charging port there's 1 hour charging to enjoy the vape all day. The Uwell Pod System adopts the 0.69 inch OLED screen display and will show you the vaping data clearly, such as output power, voltage, coil resistance, vaping time, puff counting and battery life.

The Aeglos Kit has a puff counter function, so every vape longer than 1 second would be counted as a puff and this will help you to control your vaping to quit smoking. The refillable pod can hold 3.5 ml e-juice and is aided by the removable mouthpiece so it's easy to inject your favorite e-juice. The filler hole has a silicone check valve to avoid leakage and make the filling cleaner. The airflow valve on the bottom allows being adjusted within 90° for DTL or MTL vaping. Basically - an all round amazing device!

*This device only comes in black right now.

Features:

  • Size: 107.9*26.9*26.3mm
  • Output Wattage: 5-60W
  • Built-in 1500mAh Battery
  • Patented Self-Cleaning Technology
  • Pro-FOCS Flavor Testing Technology
  • 0.69 Inch OLED Screen Display
  • Puff Counting Function
  • USB Type-C Fast Charging Port
  • Free DTL And MTL Airflow Valve
  • E-Juice Capacity: 3.5ml
  • 0.23ohm UN2 Meshed-H Coil, 40-45W
  • 0.8ohm Aeglos Coil, 20-23W
  • Convenient Top E-Juice Refill Design

entry.title: Geekvape Aegis Boost (BC Compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 44.99

Powered by an AS Chipset, the Geek Vape Aegis Boost Pod Mod Kit happens to be a robust unit which has been specifically designed and customized for an ultimate DL and MTL vaping experience. The tough Pod Mod Kit is dimensionally small however, it is made up of Zinc alloy, grainy leather and silicone.

The tiny powerpack has a 1500 mAh battery with an output wattage of 5 - 40 W. The display is sleek and stylish with a 0.42" OLED screen. It has an easy airflow valve design and comes with multiple safety and protective features. It has an in-built feature of preventing over-discharge by a short-circuit phenomenon. Additionally, it has an over-charge as well as an over-temperature protection feature which ensures maximum safety and efficacy.

Weighing only 120 g, it is shock proof, dust proof as well as waterproof. Utilized for pod as well as RDTA, it has two separate coil systems with GV coil being most compatible with Geek Vape Aegis Boost Pod Mod Kit. The rapid lock and release design helps in switching between pod systems. It is incredible for people who want to experience an exciting smoke-loving vaping experience.

Included in product package:

entry.title: Start Vaping Pack - Salt Nic Vape w/Free e-Juice (BC Compliant)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 19.99

TRADE YOUR SMOKE FOR VAPOR, AND STEP INTO A FLAVORFUL FUTURE.

You may have heard of vaping before. Maybe you've heard about it in the media. Vaping was invented because scientists were looking for a healthier alternative to smoking.
An e-cigarette or vaping device heats up e-liquid and turns it into vapor which you inhale. E-liquid comes in many different flavors and nicotine strengths all the way to no nicotine at all.
Are you interested in getting started? Grab a pack below get started with your Flaving experience now as each pack has every piece you need to start vaping today!
  • Just pick a flavor and start vaping! Everything you need is in the package; charging cable and a 20 mg flavor from our industry renowned flavor collection!
  • The Vladdin to be more similar to a cigarette's mouth to lung draw. 
Flavors you can choose from:
  • VCT - A rich vanilla custard flavor with hints of earthy, oaky undertones
  • RICH TOBACCO - The perfect blend for someone missing the flavor of analogs. A mild cigarette flavor
  • LUSCIOUS APPLE - Gooey apple with hints of cinnamon and dough
  • FROZEN WATERBERRY - Strawberry, watermelon, Kiwi with a good touch of our proprietary cooling blend
  • STRAWBERRY - Just a straight-up delicious strawberry squeezed into a bottle

Check out our sister site https://startvaping.com/ for more info. We have set up a little intro to vaping, some FAQ's, myth-busting, and vaping safety.
